comment: Dr. Moss is super nice and very helpful, I loved her class. all essays are very clear and straight to the point, just pay attention in class and participate in the discussions

This teacher is great. What she says makes sense, papers have so much freedom to express any wanted ideas. She is soo understanding and hot by the way. Definietly, would take again. and again. and again. :P
She is a very good teacher who cares, which is unlike most professors now. Just make sure you write the essays and read the books she assigns.
